description:
Tensai and Daruku have not been seen since meeting with Suruga Aya. Though he`s worried about them, Juugo goes out to have fun at Southred Mall with Yumeji, Tetsu, and Yun. Ikusaba Hiiyo has been watching them strengthen their friendships and follows them, while Tsurezure Kagetora follows him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Study of Ikusaba Hiiyo and Yoshino Saki
Ikusaba Hiiyo to Yoshino Saki ni Tsuite no Kousatsu
Étude sur Ikusaba Hiyo et Yoshino Saki
戦場緋夜と吉野咲希についての考察
